name: GeoBretagne
description: GeoBretagne is a spatial data catalog providing access to and integrated use of spatial data and information, supporting decision-making and geospatial resource management in the Brittany region. It offers powerful metadata editing, search functions, and an interactive web map viewer for discovering geospatial data, services, and maps.
owner_name: No explicit owner name found in provided URL and content; GeoBretagne is commonly associated with the Brittany regional government.
